data.text: “Nu ka ŋuti Ŋusẽkatãtɔ la
Amewo ɖea liƒokpewo ɖa,
Wokplɔa tsyɔ̃eviwo ƒe tedziwo dzonae
Wotutua asi hiãtɔwo ɖa le mɔƒome
Ame dahewo ɖoa gbe nɔa nuɖuɖu dim
Woŋe gbe le agblewo dzi na lãwo
Esi avɔ mele wo si o ta la womlɔ anyi ƒuƒlu le zã me
Tsi ƒoa wo tea wo ŋu nyuie le towo dzi,
Woɖea tsyɔ̃evi le no nu
Esi wònye avɔ mele wo si o ta la,
Wole amiti ƒe ku tum le te dzi,
Ame siwo le kudɔ ƒom ƒe ŋeŋe de dzi le dua me kɔtɔɔ
“Ame aɖewo li siwo tsi tsitre ɖe kekeli la ŋu,
Ne viviti do la, hlɔ̃dola la tsona hewua ame dahewo kple hiãtɔwo,
Ahasitɔ ƒe ŋku nɔa viviti lalam,
Le viviti me la, amewo gbãa ʋɔ,
Ke wo katã la, viviti tsiɖitsiɖie le na wo abe ŋdikekeli ene
“Evɔ la, futukpɔ ko wonye le tsi ŋgɔ,
Abe ale si dzoxɔxɔ kple kuɖiɖi kplɔa tsikpe
Vidzidɔ ŋlɔa wo be, wozua nuɖuɖu na ŋɔviwo,
Wohaa konɔwo kple vimanɔsitɔwo
Gake Mawu kplɔa kalẽtɔwo dzonae kple eƒe ŋusẽ.
Ɖewohĩ ana woaɖe dzi ɖi abu be yewole dedie
Wodoa wo ɖe dzi ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe,
“Ne mele alea o la,
